痏字的基本解释

痏
wěi
疮：“齐王疾痏”。
殴打人成创伤：“遇人不以义而见疻者，与痏人之罪钧。”
瘢痕（疤瘌）。
痛声。

痏
yòu
手颤抖。

痏
yù
病。

痏字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wěi］
［《廣韻》榮美切，上旨，云。］
(1)殴人皮破血流者为“痏”。泛指殴伤；创伤。
(2)指受创伤。
(3)中医指针刺创痕。
(4)疮。指痈疽之类。
(5)瘢痕。

痏字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【疒字部】　痏； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页772第25
【唐韻】榮美切【集韻】【韻會】羽軌切，?音洧。【說文】疻痏也。【玉篇】瘡也。【廣韻】瘡痏。【前漢·薛宣傳】遇人不以義而見疻者，與痏人之罪鈞，惡不直也。【註】應劭曰：以杖手擊人，剝其皮膚腫起，靑黑而無創瘢者，律謂疻痏。師古曰：痏，音鮪。【抱朴子擢才卷】生瘡痏於玉肌。【張衡·西京賦】所惡成瘡痏。【註】瘡痏謂瘢痕。　又【說文長箋】方言謂之翻痏，又謂之翻胃，食下咽不受也。【正字通】按痏胃音義各別，箋以痏作胃，誤。　又【集韻】尤救切，音宥。顫也。　又于六切，音郁。病也。

痏字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
痏字的起名意思

暂无。

痏
Basic explanation of words
痏
wěi
Sore: "The King of Qi is sick."
Beating people is traumatized: "A person who meets someone who is not righteous and sees a slap is related to the crime of a person."
Scar (scarring).
Pain.
痏
yòu
Shaking hands.
痏
yù
disease.
痏
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wěi］
["Guangyun" glorious and beautiful, decree, cloud. ]
(1) The person who beats up people's skin and bleeds blood is called "痏". Refers generally to assault; trauma.
(2) Refers to trauma.
(3) The wounds of traditional Chinese medicine pointer puncture.
(4) Sores. Refers to carbuncle and the like.
(5) Scars.
痏
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [Department of Sui Characters] 　痏; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 772 25
[Tang Yun] Rongmei cut [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Feather track cut,? Sound. [Said the text] Nail also. [Jade articles] Sores are also. [Guang Yun] Sores. [Previous Han·Xue Propaganda] People who meet people who don’t want to be righteous are related to the crime of people, and the evil is not straight. [Note] Ying Shao said: If you hit a person with a stick, peel off the skin and swell up, and the person who is black and non-invasive, the law is called sarcophagus. Shi Gu said: 痏, sound 鲔. [Baopu Zizhuan Caijuan] Sores are formed on the jade muscle. [Zhang Heng·Xijing Fu] The evil became sore. [Note] Sores are called scars.　[Said Wen Changjian] Dialect is called turning 痏, and also called turning the stomach, and you can’t swallow it even if you eat it. 【Zhengzitong】According to the pronunciation and meaning of 痏stomach, the note is made of 痏stomach, which is wrong.　[Jiyun] You Jiuqie, Yinyou. Trembling too.　Yuqie again, the sound is gloomy. Sick too.
痏
